remarks: Change bound variables of double restricted universal quantification, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Jul-2012.)
statement:
cbvrex2v.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvrex2v.2 $e |- ( y = w -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvrex2v $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ph <-> E. z e. A E. w e. B ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A z $.
$d B w $.
$d B x y $.
$d B y z $.
$d ch w $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps y $.
